item.title: and then the wind said...
item.itunes:summary:
I just started learning the piano towards the end of 2012 and am loving it. Composition has taken a back seat for now but thought I'd share my first original piano composition (and live recording) with you all.
While I was converting the file to mp3 the wind was speaking to me, buzzing through the window like a comb and paper, inspiring the title of the piece.
item.itunes:author: ghostly
item.itunes:keywords: and then the wind said... ghostly alonetone

item.title: accelerator
item.itunes:summary: nearly there!! not really sure about this one, it doesn't sound how it sounds in my head but i am getting there...

item.title: someone to cry over (rpm 2009)
item.itunes:summary: nearly there!! running out of time and could i get this recorded to a click??! Hell no, so i did it live and it shows. ah well, it has a certain charm!
item.itunes:author: ghostly
item.itunes:keywords: someone to cry over (rpm 2009) ghostly alonetone

item.title: it's like we were meant to be (rpm 2009)
item.itunes:summary: started as a middle 8 to another rpm song but i liked it enough to give it its own song!! not that i needed the track count! ;-)
item.itunes:author: ghostly
item.itunes:keywords: it's like we were meant to be (rpm 2009) ghostly alonetone

item.title: left wanting
item.itunes:summary: don't even remember recording this last night, i just found it half done on my hard drive this morning!
item.itunes:author: ghostly

item.title: looking
item.itunes:summary: Churning out tracks is getting pretty tough, so much so and I am leaving this as piano only - cheating? Never!!
item.itunes:author: ghostly

item.title: don't fight (rpm 2009)
item.itunes:summary: lack of middle 8 = spiritual!
item.itunes:author: ghostly

item.title: brother
item.itunes:summary: not too sure about this one, i was after a thom yorke style tune and the basics were there but i am not a patch on him vocally, ah well.
item.itunes:author: ghostly

item.title: a loving embrace (rpm 2009)
item.itunes:summary: So, I'm picking up the pace now! Hope the quality is not too ropey...
item.itunes:author: ghostly

item.title: meadows (rpm 2009)
item.itunes:summary: first song "completed" for rpm 2009, needs a whole heap of work but would be happy if had to include as is. at least it's a start!!
